services.title: Data integration
services.description: Integrating a wide-ranging set of external data feeds, covering all AML, KYC and due diligence checks, ensures that you're notified of any red flag risks.

services.title: Smart automation
services.description: Automating the on-boarding and escalation process of low, medium and high-risk customers helps you to drive efficiency and reduce error-prone manual work.

services.title: Risk analysis
services.description: Evidence-based analysis of a subject (individual and/or company) allows the identification of any undue regulatory, compliance or professional risks that you and your business may be exposed to.

services.title: Accelerate authentication
services.description: Easily authenticate the information held against individuals, trusts, businesses and corporations.

services.title: Repeatable workflow
services.description: Preset workflow using automatically populated data fields ensures that handlers complete remediation tasks in a consistent and repeatable manner.

services.title: Single point-of-truth
services.description: Our platform empowers businesses to streamline, manage, remediate and codify customer data and risk in a single digital solution.
